page.title: 19 ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: Owing to the fact that many people are involved in farming within this area and farming being a full-time, all season occupation little time is left for hobbies. One gentleman plays the bagpipes and this seemed to be the only person actively in musical pursuits. A lady at Woodside Cottages grows, dries and arrangesflowers - often placing them upon graves. All hobbies seem to be centred round the home and no selling takes place. These hobbies include knitting, cookery, gardening and painting. There are no facilities in the area for arts and crafts. The nearest place would appear to be Shrewsbury in this respect.
